Uses of Interface
org.openhab.core.scheduler.ScheduledCompletableFuture

  • Packages that use ScheduledCompletableFuture 
    Package Description
    org.openhab.core.scheduler  

    • Uses of ScheduledCompletableFuture in org.openhab.core.scheduler

      Methods in org.openhab.core.scheduler that return ScheduledCompletableFuture 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<java.time.Instant> Scheduler.after​(java.time.Duration delay)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that will resolve after the given duration.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.after​(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable, java.time.Duration delay)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves after delaying with the result of the call that is executed after the delay.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<java.time.Instant> Scheduler.at​(java.time.Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.at​(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable, java.time.Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime with the result of the call.
      default ScheduledCompletableFuture<@Nullable java.lang.Void> Scheduler.at​(SchedulerRunnable runnable, java.time.Instant instant)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that resolves at the given epochTime and runs the runnable.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.before​(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> promise, java.time.Duration timeout)
      Return a ScheduledCompletableFuture that fails with a TimeoutException when the given CompletableFuture is not resolved before the given timeout.
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> CronScheduler.schedule​(CronJob cronJob, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> config, java.lang.String cronExpression)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed for the give cron expression (See CronJob).
      ScheduledCompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> CronScheduler.schedule​(SchedulerRunnable runnable, java.lang.String cronExpression)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed for the give cron expression (See CronJob).
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> PeriodicScheduler.schedule​(SchedulerRunnable runnable, java.time.Duration... delays)
      Schedule a runnable to be executed in definitely at the given delays.
      <T> ScheduledCompletableFuture<T> Scheduler.schedule​(SchedulerRunnable callable, SchedulerTemporalAdjuster temporalAdjuster)
      Schedules the callable once or repeating using the temporalAdjuster to determine the time the callable should run.
